author: mumuhamm
body:
Golden Patterns for extrapolated algorithm : Patterns_ExtraplMB1nadMB2SimplifiedFP_t17_classProb17_recalib2_minDP0_v3.xml, 
Hardware to logic layers for Phase-I(run3) : hwToLogicLayer_0x0009.xml
Hardware to logic layers for Phase-II(run4) : hwToLogicLayer_0x0209.xml
title: Adding the golden patterns and hwToLogiclayer in order to trigger displaced muons
